job_details.Vacaturetitel: Machine Learning Engineer I - GENAI Studio
job_details.full_text: Machine Learning Engineer I - GENAI Studio

profile_classification.rationale: The job title explicitly mentions 'GENAI Studio' and the description emphasizes building and deploying generative AI applications. While 'Machine Learning Engineer' is in the title, the focus on generative models and application development aligns more closely with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The title 'Machine Learning Engineer' and the mention of 'GENAI Studio' directly imply work with machine learning models, specifically within the generative AI domain.

The 'Engineer I' designation suggests a role involved in the practical application and development of ML technologies, which often includes software development aspects to integrate models into systems.
